scripts.build-all-plataform: npm run gen-api && vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && cd backend && npm version patch && cd ../cubejs && npm version patch
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && cd backend && npm version minor && cd ../cubejs && npm version minor
scripts.release:major: npm version major && cd backend && npm version major && cd ../cubejs && npm version major
scripts.gen-api: rm -rf src/api-client && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./spec/schema_osm.yml -g typescript-axios -o src/api-client-osm --additional-properties withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,supportsES6=true,useSingleRequestParameter=true,apiPackage=api,modelPackage=models && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./spec/schema_datosgeo.yml -g typescript-axios -o src/api-client-datosgeo --additional-properties withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,supportsES6=true,useSingleRequestParameter=true,apiPackage=api,modelPackage=models && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./spec/schema_backend.yml -g typescript-axios -o src/api-client-backend --additional-properties withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,supportsES6=true,useSingleRequestParameter=true,apiPackage=api,modelPackage=models
